name: Green Goddess Smoothie Bowl
ingredients: 2 tbsp Sliced almonds and chia seeds (for topping)
instructions: Add frozen banana, spinach, avocado, vanilla whey, and almond milk to blender
Blend on high until thick and creamy
Should be thicker than a regular smoothie
Top with sliced almonds and chia seeds
Optional: Add fresh berries, granola, or hemp hearts
